widgets.script:
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_x", value[0])
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_z", value[1])
set("cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_xz_value", value)

widgets.label: ^caret-up
^caret-down
^caret-left
^caret-right
^undo-alt
^redo-alt
^search-plus
^search-minus

widgets.script:
var val = get("cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_zoom"),
    low1 = get("zoom_min"),
    high1 = get("zoom_max"),
    low2 = 0,
    high2 = 100,
    outputValue = low2 + (high2 - low2) * (val - low1) / (high1 - low1),
    // zoom_val = Math.trunc(outputValue)
    zoom_val = outputValue.toFixed(2)
set("zoom_readout", zoom_val + " %")

send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_k1", 0)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_k2", 0)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_k3", 0)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_pa_width", 1)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_center_shift_x", 0)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_center_shift_y", 0)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_aspect_ratio", 1.77778)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_horizontal_fov", 1.5)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_sensor_size_x", 1)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_sensor_size_y", 0.5625)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_focal_lenght", 1)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_x", 0)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_z", 0)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_y", 1.6)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_pan", 0)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_tilt", 0)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_roll", 0)
send(get("osc_cam_tx"), "/d3/cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_zoom", 1.23)
widgets.label: Setup Camera in disguise
Reset all cam values
widgets.script:
var value
if (value == 1) {
   set ("cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_xz", [0,0]),
   set ("cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_y", 1.6),
   set ("cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_pan", 0),
   set ("cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_tilt", 0),
   set ("cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_roll", 0),
   set ("cam_" + get("cam_variable") + "_zoom", 1.23)
}
